snippet: The police stepped up security in response to the possible threat of a terrorist attack in Times Square, even as officials cautioned that they had no information about specific plans against the city.
abstract: New York City police beef up security in response to possible threat of terrorist attack in Times Square; officials stress they have no credible information about specific plans against city, but are being cautious in light of online post purportedly from Islamic State encouraging 'lone wolf' attacks on tourist attractions around nation.
lead_paragraph: The police stepped up security in response to the possible threat of a terrorist attack in Times Square, even as officials cautioned that they had no information about specific plans against the city.

headline.main: New York City Police Add Security Amid a Call for Attacks
headline.print_headline: City Police Add Security Amid a Call for Attacks

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
